task.title: How to Choose "Ice Cream" on Cuisinart ICE-60W
task.shortdesc: You've found Cuisinart ICE-60W in one of your class rooms. You're ready to eat some delicious ice cream. But first, you must turn the machine on and select your treat.

taskbody.context: For this task, all that you need is the ice cream machine.

step.cmd: Plug in the Cuisinart ICE-60W into a power outlet.
Press the power button located in the front of the matchine.
Select the "Ice Cream" option on the control panel, located on the front of the machine.
